name: Fisherman Adventure
description:
FISHERMAN ADVENTURE :

Fisherman Adventure is a puzzle game by taking concepts from several games that we make references. In the game there is a character who must pass various obstacles and traps to find a way out of a chapter. In each chapter itself there are items to complete the puzzle, the level of difficulty of the puzzle also increases with the level / chapter being completed.

In this game the character will have additional skills when getting items in several locations, to get it the player must complete the puzzle first or first and after passing the initial puzzle the player will be at the checkpoint with circular light and the player will enter the circle to checkpoints and get skills, skills gained are very closely related to the puzzle in the future, but not all chapter players will get it.
